Constitutional Officers.name: Governor's Office
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Chief executive of the state, responsible for implementing state laws and coordinating state agencies

Constitutional Officers.name: Lieutenant Governor
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Second highest executive officer, acting governor when governor is absent

Constitutional Officers.name: Secretary of State
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Chief elections officer, keeper of state records and business filings

Constitutional Officers.name: State Controller
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Chief fiscal officer, responsible for state disbursements and financial controls

Constitutional Officers.name: State Treasurer
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: State's banker, manages investments and debt

Constitutional Officers.name: Attorney General
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Chief law officer, provides legal services to state government

Constitutional Officers.name: Insurance Commissioner
Constitutional Officers.keyFunctions: Regulates insurance industry and protects consumers

Superagencies and Departments.name: Business, Consumer Services, and Housing Agency
Superagencies and Departments.keyFunctions: Oversees departments responsible for business oversight, consumer protection, housing policy, and professional licensing

subAgencies.name: Department of Financial Protection and Innovation
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Financial services regulation and consumer protection

subAgencies.name: Department of Consumer Affairs
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Professional licensing boards and consumer protection

Superagencies and Departments.name: Transportation Agency
Superagencies and Departments.keyFunctions: Oversees state transportation systems and infrastructure

Superagencies and Departments.name: Government Operations Agency
Superagencies and Departments.keyFunctions: Oversees state operations including procurement, technology, human resources, and administrative functions

subAgencies.name: Department of General Services
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Serves as the business manager for the state, providing procurement, real estate management, design and construction, fleet administration, printing, and other services to state agencies

subAgencies.name: Department of Technology
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Provides technology leadership, guidance, and oversight to state departments and is the guardian of public data, a leader in IT services and solutions, and an innovator in IT infrastructure

subAgencies.name: Department of Human Resources
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Manages state civil service system, including recruitment, selection, classification, compensation, benefits, and labor relations for state employees

Standalone Departments.name: Office of Emergency Services
Standalone Departments.keyFunctions: Emergency management and disaster response coordination

Standalone Departments.name: Governor's Office of Business and Economic Development
Native American Heritage Commission
Standalone Departments.keyFunctions: Protection of Native American cultural resources

Standalone Departments.name: Exposition Park
Standalone Departments.keyFunctions: Management of Exposition Park cultural and recreational facilities

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Department of Health Care Services
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Administration of Medi-Cal and other health care programs for low-income Californians

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Operation of state prisons, rehabilitation programs, parole supervision, and juvenile justice facilities

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Department of Education
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Oversight of the state's public school system, curriculum development, and educational policy

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Environmental Protection Agency
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Oversees environmental protection, pollution control, and climate change programs

subAgencies.name: Air Resources Board
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Regulates air pollution, implements climate change programs, and administers clean transportation incentives

subAgencies.name: Energy Commission
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Energy policy and planning, renewable energy programs

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: Natural Resources Agency
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Oversees and coordinates the state's natural resources programs

subAgencies.name: Department of Forestry and Fire Protection
State Lands Commission
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Management of state lands and resources

subAgencies.name: California Tahoe Conservancy
subAgencies.keyFunctions: Environmental protection and restoration in the Lake Tahoe Basin

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Department of Parks and Recreation
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Management of state parks, beaches, and historic sites

Independent Boards and Commissions.name: California Department of Public Health
Independent Boards and Commissions.keyFunctions: Protection of public health through disease prevention, health promotion, and health equity initiatives
